about_the_game:
Deck of Defense is a deck-building, tower defense game where you place cards to defend your base. Craft a unique deck, upgrade your abilities, unlock game-breaking defense strategies, and see if your Deck of Defense can stand the test of time.

FEATURES

  • Dynamic Deck Building: Discover hundreds of different cards to bolster your defense or create a surprise attack. Find new synergies within each run to discover a deck that can withstand the test of time
  • Historical Battle Strategies: Your opponents will adopt more proficient battle strategies as you move throughout the eras. Find your own unique exploits to beat their formations and tear down their ranks
  • Defense Management: As your defense grows throughout time, you will have to carefully select where to place towers in order to maximize their efficiency. Balance a combination of traps, obstacles, support, and towers to find a strategy that works for you!

GAMEPLAY

Starting in the Ancient Era, you must weather the attacks of cavemen, dodo birds, and other prehistoric beasts to survive and advance your technology. Once you collect enough gems you can evolve to the next time period where you have access to more powerful towers - but are also pinned up against stronger opponents. Choose your cards carefully and develop a winning strategy in order to fight your way back to the present.

TIME PERIODS

  • Ancient
  • Medieval
  • Future (In development)
